title: Jamie Begley - Lucky's Choice (The Last Riders Book 7) [Kween]

A good man would walk away and not touch the curvy woman who had been tugging on his heartstrings. Lucky wasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t a good man. Therefore, the bad-ass biker in him had a choice: once again become the man he had pretended to be and stake his claim, or take the devilÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s highway. 


Some girls had all the luck. 

Willa wasnÃ¢â‚¬â„¢t one of them. All she wanted to do was give a home to the children she had made orphans. Instead, she found herself needing help from the man who had left the pulpit behind to embrace a life of sin.

*WARNING*
